name: Dreaming Mary
summary:
Mary从梦中醒来，却发现自己身处于粉红色的梦境中，
在梦中她遇到了哪些有趣的事情，并且得知了什么呢？

Controls
Z: confirm
X: cancel
Arrow keys: movement
A: return to title screen
S: save
Shift: run

You may pause the proceedings of the game by simply clicking outside of the game.
